hero.gitCloneText: Clone Ring now, it's free forever:

trinityUkraine.title: Trinity Ukraine - Our Gift to the World
trinityUkraine.subtitle: Built by Trinity Ukraine ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦ - Our gift to the world with gratitude for helping us prove our right to independence
trinityUkraine.missionText: Technology should unite, not divide. Ring enables anyone, anywhere to solve collective needs without expensive developers or vendor lock-in.
trinityUkraine.philosophyText: Ukrainian farmers can deploy the same sophisticated platform as Silicon Valley startups. African artisans access the same AI-powered marketplace as Amazon.
trinityUkraine.originSubtitle: How Trinity Ukraine built Ring during Ukraine's struggle for independence
trinityUkraine.beginningText: As Russia invaded Ukraine, we witnessed how technology could be a weapon of oppression. Centralized platforms controlled by foreign entities could be shut down or manipulated. We decided to build something different.
trinityUkraine.buildingText: Working from basements and cafes during air raids, we developed Ring - a platform that puts power back in the hands of communities. No more vendor lock-in, no more expensive developers, no more centralized control.
trinityUkraine.impactText: Ring deployments are helping communities worldwide. From agricultural cooperatives in Ukraine to artisan marketplaces in Kenya, Ring is proving that sophisticated technology can be accessible to everyone.
trinityUkraine.worldMapText: See Ring deployments, use cases per region, and success metrics from live deployments worldwide.
trinityUkraine.futureQuote: Imagine asking your Ring platform: 'Add a blockchain-verified certificate system for educational courses' - and watching as the platform autonomously generates the module, deploys smart contracts, updates the UI, and tests itself. No developers in the middle. You talk directly to your platform. This is our roadmap.
trinityUkraine.teamSubtitle: Photos and bios of Trinity Ukraine founders/developers
trinityUkraine.joinMissionText: Help us democratize technology access worldwide. Whether you're a developer, organization, or community leader - there's a place for you in the Ring ecosystem.
